languages.text: {n}Худощавый сгорбленный мужчина изучает вас пронзительным взглядом. Один глаз его скользит по вам, другой заменен массивным аугментом, древним и украшенным золотом, но почему-то выключенным. Сухим голосом он констатирует:{/n} "Призраки небытия ступили на палубу племени акобов".

{n}The lean, hunchbacked man studies you with his piercing gaze. One of his eyes looks you up and down, the other has been replaced by a bulky augmetic, ancient and adorned with gold but is deactivated for some reason. He states in a dry voice,{/n} "The ghosts of nothingness have entered the deck of the Acgen tribe."
languages.original_text: {n}Худощавый сгорбленный мужчина изучает вас пронзительным взглядом. Один глаз его скользит по вам, другой заменен массивным аугментом, древним и украшенным золотом, но почему-то выключенным. Сухим голосом он констатирует:{/n} "Призраки небытия ступили на палубу племени акобов".

traits.locale_text: {n}The lean, hunchbacked man studies you with his piercing gaze. One of his eyes is looking you up and down; the other one has been replaced by a bulky augmetic, ancient and gold-adorned but deactivated for some reason. He states in a dry voice,{/n} "The ghosts of nothingness have entered the deck of the Acgen tribe."
traits.speaker: Chief

languages.text: {n}痩せこけた猫背の男が鋭い目つきであなたをつぶさに見ている。片目だけであなたを上へ下へと眺めている。もう片方の目には大きなオーグメティックが付いている。金色の装飾が施された古めかしいそれは、何らかの理由で使われていないようだ。男は乾いた声を発する。{/n}「無の亡霊が、アクジェン族のデッキに侵入した」
languages.original_text: {n}The lean, hunchbacked man studies you with his piercing gaze. One of his eyes looks you up and down, the other has been replaced by a bulky augmetic, ancient and adorned with gold but is deactivated for some reason. He states in a dry voice,{/n} "The ghosts of nothingness have entered the deck of the Acgen tribe."

traits.locale_text: {n}痩せこけた猫背の男が鋭い目つきであなたをつぶさに見ている。片目だけであなたを上へ下へと眺めている。もう片方の目には大きなオーグメティックが付いている。金色の装飾が施された古めかしいそれは、何らかの理由で使われていないようだ。男は乾いた声を発する。{/n}「無の亡霊が、アクジェン族のデッキに侵入した」
traits.speaker: Chief

languages.text: {n}这个瘦削、驼背的人以锐利的目光打量着你。他只有一只眼睛在仔细看着你，另一只眼睛被笨重的植入物取代。这个植入物看起来很古老，表面饰着黄金，但由于某种原因，它停止了运作。这个人以干巴巴的声音开了口。{/n}“虚无的鬼魂进入了通侍部落的甲板。”
languages.original_text: {n}The lean, hunchbacked man studies you with his piercing gaze. One of his eyes looks you up and down, the other has been replaced by a bulky augmetic, ancient and adorned with gold but is deactivated for some reason. He states in a dry voice,{/n} "The ghosts of nothingness have entered the deck of the Acgen tribe."

traits.locale_text: {n}这个瘦削、驼背的人以锐利的目光打量着你。他只有一只眼睛在仔细看着你，另一只眼睛被笨重的植入物取代。这个植入物看起来很古老，表面饰着黄金，但由于某种原因，它停止了运作。这个人以干巴巴的声音开了口。{/n}“虚无的鬼魂进入了通侍部落的甲板。”
traits.speaker: Chief

languages.text: {n}L'homme svelte, mais bossu qui se tient devant vous vous examine de haut en bas d'un œil perçant, son deuxième œil ayant été remplacé par un ancien augmétique décoré d'or qui semble désactivé pour une raison qui vous échappe.{/n} « Les fantômes du néant ont pénétré sur le pont de la tribu Acgen, » {n}annonce-t-il d'une voix sèche.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The lean, hunchbacked man studies you with his piercing gaze. One of his eyes looks you up and down, the other has been replaced by a bulky augmetic, ancient and adorned with gold but is deactivated for some reason. He states in a dry voice,{/n} "The ghosts of nothingness have entered the deck of the Acgen tribe."

traits.locale_text: {n}L'homme svelte, mais bossu qui se tient devant vous vous examine de haut en bas d'un œil perçant, son deuxième œil ayant été remplacé par un ancien augmétique décoré d'or qui semble désactivé pour une raison qui vous échappe.{/n} « Les fantômes du néant ont pénétré sur le pont de la tribu Acgen, » {n}annonce-t-il d'une voix sèche.{/n}
traits.speaker: Chief

languages.text: {n}El hombre delgado y encorvado te analiza con su mirada penetrante. Uno de sus ojos te mira de arriba abajo, mientras que el otro no es más que un prominente aumético antiguo adornado con oro, pero que permanece desactivado por alguna razón. Con una voz áspera, dice:{/n} «Los fantasmas de la nada han accedido a la cubierta de la tribu Acgen».
languages.original_text: {n}The lean, hunchbacked man studies you with his piercing gaze. One of his eyes looks you up and down, the other has been replaced by a bulky augmetic, ancient and adorned with gold but is deactivated for some reason. He states in a dry voice,{/n} "The ghosts of nothingness have entered the deck of the Acgen tribe."

traits.locale_text: {n}El hombre delgado y encorvado te analiza con su mirada penetrante. Uno de sus ojos te mira de arriba abajo, mientras que el otro no es más que un prominente aumético antiguo adornado con oro, pero que permanece desactivado por alguna razón. Con una voz áspera, dice:{/n} «Los fantasmas de la nada han accedido a la cubierta de la tribu Acgen».
traits.speaker: Chief

languages.text: {n}Der schlanke, bucklige Mann mustert dich mit seinem durchbohrenden Blick. Eines seiner Augen prüft dich von oben bis unten, das andere wurde durch eine klobige Augmentation ersetzt, uralt und mit Gold verziert, aber aus irgendeinem Grund deaktiviert. Er merkt mit trockener Stimme an:{/n} "Die Geister des Nichts haben das Deck des Akgen-Stamms betreten."
languages.original_text: {n}The lean, hunchbacked man studies you with his piercing gaze. One of his eyes looks you up and down, the other has been replaced by a bulky augmetic, ancient and adorned with gold but is deactivated for some reason. He states in a dry voice,{/n} "The ghosts of nothingness have entered the deck of the Acgen tribe."

traits.locale_text: {n}Der schlanke, bucklige Mann mustert dich mit seinem durchbohrenden Blick. Eines seiner Augen prüft dich von oben bis unten, das andere wurde durch eine klobige Augmentation ersetzt, uralt und mit Gold verziert, aber aus irgendeinem Grund deaktiviert. Er merkt mit trockener Stimme an:{/n} "Die Geister des Nichts haben das Deck des Akgen-Stamms betreten."
traits.speaker: Chief

languages.text: {n}İnce yapılı, kambur adam; delici bakışlarla seni inceliyor. Gözlerinden biri seni tepeden tırnağa süzüyor. Diğer gözü; kadim, ağır ve altın süslemeli bir ogmetikle değiştirilmiş, ogmetik ise bir sebepten devre dışı kalmış. Hissiz bir sesle konuşmaya başlıyor.{/n} "Hiçliğin hayaletleri, Hagen kabilesinin güvertesine giriş yaptın."
languages.original_text: {n}The lean, hunchbacked man studies you with his piercing gaze. One of his eyes looks you up and down, the other has been replaced by a bulky augmetic, ancient and adorned with gold but is deactivated for some reason. He states in a dry voice,{/n} "The ghosts of nothingness have entered the deck of the Acgen tribe."

traits.locale_text: {n}İnce yapılı, kambur adam, delici bakışlarla seni inceliyor. Gözlerinden biri seni tepeden tırnağa süzüyor, diğer gözü ise kadim, ağır ve altın süslemeli bir ogmetikle değiştirilmiş ancak ogmetik bir sebepten devre dışı bırakılmış. Hissiz bir sesle konuşmaya başlıyor:{/n} "Hiçliğin hayaletleri, Hagen kabilesinin güvertesine giriş yaptılar."
traits.speaker: Chief
